name: Plantvine
description: A botanic monster that inhabits grassland. Usually lurks in burrows with only the twin leaves of its head visible. Timid, rarely attacks humans.

name: Torasampe
description: A botanic monster in revenant castles. Hides in the ground near the dead, with twin leaves as its only visible feature. Savage and craves human flesh.

name: Sahagin
description: An aquatic monster, half fish and half beast, that inhabits shore areas. Arms are unusually strong and well-developed. Apparently a poor swimmer.

name: Sea Slater
description: An arthropod monster that inhabits damp shore caves. Rustles about the rocks and licks moss and seaweed. Many humans find it repulsive.

name: Blaberus
description: An arthropod monster that inhabits damp forest thickets. Rustles up trees and licks sap and fruit. Many humans find it repulsive.

name: Shell Octopus
description: A molluscoid monster that inhabits rocky coastal areas. Usually hides inside tough shells. Spits ink to blind its enemies.

name: Sea Lizard
description: A subspecies of lizard that inhabits shore areas. Ferocious and will seize any chance to bite. Does not take damage while hiding underground.

name: Sea Ghost
description: A spirit monster that haunts shore areas. If this monster is killed with a curse, it returns in the same form to haunt the land of the living.

name: Savage Crab
description: A crustaceous shore monster with giant claws and a hard carapace. Nuisance in attacks, but prized by fishermen for its delicious flavor.

name: Desert Crab
description: A crustaceous monster that inhabits the desert. Has giant claws and a hard carapace. Its flesh is so delicious that all fall silent while eating it.

name: Remora
description: A monster that inhabits shore areas. Stops prey with high-pressure water and then bites with sharp fangs. Its delicious red flesh is rich in iron.

name: Petit Gargoyle
description: A stone castle guardian, imbued with life with high magic. When its magic expires, its eyes lose their color, and it becomes an ordinary statue again.

name: Corpse Knight
description: An undead monster utterly bound to its master's will. Raised by a higher revenant from the corpse of a low-ranking knight fallen on the battlefield.

name: Hell Knight
description: An undead monster utterly bound to its master's will. Raised by a higher revenant from the corpse of a knight fallen on the battlefield.

name: Corpse Guard
description: An undead monster utterly bound to its master's will. Raised by a higher revenant from the corpse of a heavy infantryman fallen on the battlefield.

name: Cursed Guard
description: An undead monster utterly bound to its master's will. Raised by a higher revenant from the corpse of a heavy infantryman fallen on the battlefield.

name: Hell Guard
description: An undead monster utterly bound to its master's will. Raised by a higher revenant from the corpse of a guard fallen on the battlefield.

name: Corpse Witch
description: An undead monster utterly bound to its master's will. Raised by a higher revenant from the corpse of a mage fallen on the battlefield.

name: Cursed Witch
description: An undead monster utterly bound to its master's will. Raised by a higher revenant from the corpse of a high mage fallen on the battlefield.

name: Hellflower
description: A botanic monster mutated by human corpse nutrients. Paralyzes victims with pollen before preying on them. Originally a small insectivorous plant.

name: Soul Reaper
description: A revenant, that was once an executioner cursed to death by its former master. Now vengefully roams earth, seeking to decapitate every being it finds.

name: Evil Spirit
description: A spirit monster found in caves and ruined castles. Said to be the remnant of a being that died with strong worldly attachments.

name: Corpse Rider
description: A revenant that was once a knight who amassed deeds of valor on many battlefields with his steed. Roams battlefields in looking for a place to die.

name: Wandering Golem
description: A type of Rune Golem seen in the Rune-Lens Research Laboratory. Small and weak. Attacks by charging, but has bad balance.

name: Wandering Golem
description: A type of Rune Golem sighted in the Northern Barrows. Small and weak. Attacks by charging, but has bad balance. Covered in moss.

name: Huge Mite
description: An arthropod monster that inhabits damp vegetated areas. Viciously attacks in swarms to suck the blood of its prey.

name: Golem Cleaner
description: A type of Rune Golem seen in Runebarrows. Fires a powerful destructive beam to clean up broken golems and intruders.

name: Golem Cleaner
description: A type of Rune Golem sighted in the Northern Barrows. Fires a powerful destructive beam to clean up broken golems and intruders. Covered in moss.

name: Assault Cleaner
description: An upgraded golem cleaner sighted at the Rune-Lens Research Laboratory. Fires a powerful destructive beam to clean up broken golems and intruders.

name: Aether Slime
description: A monster that inhabits tunnels and caves. Dissolves and absorbs anything that crosses its path. It vibrate its body to boost its resistance to magic.

name: Pawn Demon
description: The lowest species of demon. Demons themselves are very seldom sighted. Origin unknown.

name: Andromalius
description: A subspecies of the very rarely sighted pawn demon. Higher species of demons are said to have smaller bodies.

name: Ancient Seed
description: A botanic monster that inhabits deep forests. Uses its two claws and huge mouth and teeth to prey on even large organisms.

name: Seed Conqueror
description: A subspecies of Ancient Seed that inhabits deep forest. Uses its two claws and huge mouth and teeth to prey on even large organisms.

name: Eggfoot
description: An egg-type monster that inhabits grassland and forest. Domesticated eggfoots are traded for races. Drops plain ole eggs.

name: Mach Egg
description: A subspecies of eggfoot that inhabits grassland and forest. The fastest of all wild eggfoots.

name: Odd Egg
description: A subspecies of eggfoot that inhabits grassland and forest. Has some remaining shell attached due to hatching too hastily.

name: Shell Egg
description: A subspecies of eggfoot that inhabits grassland and forest. Unlike regular eggfoots, this variant grows to adulthood with its shell attached.

name: Frost Shell
description: A subspecies of eggfoot that inhabits the Whitecrowns. Retains its shell to keep warm amid the cold.

name: Lizard
description: A reptilian monster that inhabits grassland. Savagely bites at any opportunity. Does not take damage while hiding underground.

name: Forest Lizard
description: A subspecies of lizard that inhabits the Greatwood. Savagely bites at any opportunity. Does not take damage while hiding underground.

name: Cockatrice (Hatchling)
description: A flying monster that inhabits mountains and forests. Still juvenile and cannot fly properly. May call parents when threatened.

name: Richie Cockatrice
description: A flying monster that inhabits mountains and forests. Still juvenile and cannot fly properly. Somehow possesses a great deal of baqua.

name: Strange Bird
description: A subspecies of cockatrice that inhabits forests. Still juvenile and cannot fly properly. May call parents when threatened.

name: Cockatrice (adult)
description: Mountain and forest-dwelling flying monster. Turns humans to stone when its young is threatened. Occasionally appears alone during breeding season.

name: Hippogriff
description: Forest-dwelling cockatrice subspecies. Turns humans to stone when its young are threatened. Occasionally appears alone during breeding season.

name: Synthetic Specimen C_0282
description: A mass-produced specimen created in Dux Aldric's research by melding a cockatrice with a rune-lens. Controllable with a regule.

name: Tyrant Tortoise
description: A large reptilian monster that inhabits the Greatwood. Covered with a hard carapace that shields it from all half-hearted attacks.

name: Modified Specimen T_1965
description: A weapon born from Dux Aldric's research. Created by melding a tyrant tortoise with a rune-lens to yield a controllable specimen.

name: Sandfish
description: A fish-monster that inhabits the desert. Its white flesh is delicious with sauce. Dried sandfish fins are a local specialty.

name: Asterion
description: A beast-monster that inhabits the Chelonian Goliath, Vilashnu. Attacks with devastating headbutts and a paralyzing roar.

name: Modified Specimen W_1155
description: A weapon born from Dux Aldric's research. Created by melding an asterion with a rune-lens in an attempt to make a controllable specimen.

name: Cactus Predator
description: A botanic monster that inhabits swamps and rocky ridges. Scatters poisonous spikes to protect itself from enemies.

name: Desert Serval
description: Desert beast-monster with nimble attacks and sharp claws for tearing prey. Reckless attackers face swift and brutal retribution from its fangs.

name: Scorpion Assassin
description: An arthropod monster that savagely attacks with its giant claws and venomous sting. Death is a constant peril for those who would confront it.

name: Wild Boar
description: A beast-monster that inhabits mountains. Vigilante groups are often formed to eradicate this crop-ravaging omnivore. Perilous to confront head-on.

name: Frost Boar
description: Whitecrown-dwelling Wild Boar subspecies. Avoids human settlements, charges fiercely even in the snow, and is perilous to confront head-on.

name: Ogre
description: This vicious race travels in gangs. Ogres assault humans and don the gear they plunder. Presumed to be incapable of understanding human speech, but...

name: Balor
description: A breed of ogres that travels in packs. Assaults humans and dons plundered gear. Presumed to be incapable of understanding human speech, but...

name: Forest Eater
description: A botanic monster that inhabits forests. Launches surprise attacks from above by swinging down on threads. Captured prey is hauled up to the canopy.

name: Forest Ruler
description: Forest-dwelling Forest Eater subspecies. Launches surprise attacks from above by swinging down on threads. Captured prey is hauled up to the canopy.

name: Hellhound
description: A beast-monster that inhabits the Greatwood. Savages its prey with its razor-sharp claws and fangs.

name: Modified Specimen H_008
description: A weapon born from Dux Aldric's research, mass-produced by melding hellhounds with rune-lenses to yield controllable specimens.

name: Killer Fungus
description: A botanic monster that inhabits swamps and the Greatwood. Defends itself from enemies using its toxic spores.

name: Toadstool
description: A subspecies of killer fungi that inhabits the depths of the Greatwood. Defends itself from enemies using its toxic spores.

name: Earth Dragon
description: A rare land-dragon that inhabits the Chelonian Goliath, Vilashnu. Generates thunderbolts in its body and discharges them through its mouth.

name: Experimental Specimen A_0099
description: A weapon born from Dux Aldric's research. Created by melding an earth dragon with a rune-lens to yield a controllable specimen.

name: HrÃ¦svelgr
description: A flying monster that inhabits Redthroat Ridge. Kicks its prey with its powerful legs.

name: Phantombird
description: A subspecies of hraesvelgr. Kicks its prey with its powerful legs. Likes to collect shiny objects.

name: Rabbit Knight
description: Found all over the continent, the rabbit have clever hands and make all kinds of things for themselves.

name: Rabbit Lancer
description: A type of rabbit found all over the continent. The rabbit lancer, handy with a lance, is an aggressive higher form of knight rabbit.

name: Rabbit Hero
description: A type of rabbit found all over the continent. These rabbits, in their black armor, are the highest form of knight rabbit, and are everyone's hero.

name: Rabbit Wizard
description: A subspecies of rabbit found all over the continent. The rabbit wizard is proficient in magic and provides rear-guard support.

name: Rabbit Mage
description: A type of rabbit found all over the continent. The rabbit mage is a veteran magicians with stronger magic than that of a rabbit wizard.

name: Rabbit Archwitch
description: Continent-wide rabbit species. As the highest form of rabbit wizard, the rabbit archwitch is an advanced magician capable of riding a broomstick.

name: Bear Rider
description: A subspecies of rabbit knight found all over the continent. Commands a bear as an apprentice beast-tamer. Calls its fellows using a flute.

name: Bushtamer
description: A rabbit found all over the continent. A higher form of bear rider that commands particularly ferocious bears. Calls its friends using a flute.

name: Land Octopus
description: A molluscoid monster that inhabits tunnels. Usually hides inside a hard shell. Throws stones to intimidate enemies.

name: Death tracker
description: A reptilian monster that inhabits tunnels. Discharges toxic gas from its body to protect itself from enemies.

name: Wyvern
description: A reptilian monster that inhabits grassland. Its atrophied wings are too feeble for flying. Belches fire and beats its wings to produce shockwaves.

name: Red Wyvern
description: A subspecies of wyvern that inhabits forests. Its atrophied wings are too feeble for flying. Belches fire and beats its wings to produce shockwaves.

name: Gigas
description: A race of giants that inhabits the desert. They have their own metalworking and leatherworking techniques.

name: Jotunn
description: A subspecies of gigas that inhabits the Whitecrowns. They have their own metalworking and leatherworking techniques.

name: Sky Sahagin
description: A subspecies of sahagin that inhabits the Greatwood. Swoops down to attack.

name: Sonic rider
description: A subspecies of sahagin that inhabits the Great Sandy Sea. Swoops down to attack. Rumored to be able to fly faster than sound.

name: Shadow Unicorn
description: A beast-monster that inhabits the area around the Proving Grounds. Has a habit of shooting its horn at travelers.

name: Carbuncle
description: A beast-monster that inhabits cold regions. Has a habit of using light-magic to play tricks on travelers.

name: Titan Slug
description: A molluscoid monster that inhabits tunnels. Preys on humans, rabbits, and sahagin by spewing corrosive digestive juices over them.

name: Salt Slug
description: A subspecies of giant slug that inhabits shore areas. Preys on humans, rabbits, and sahagin by spewing corrosive digestive juices over them.

name: Army Beetle
description: Grassland monster. Attacks humans with its formidable jaws. Males fight each other with their prized horns for dominance.

name: Goldbug
description: A subspecies of army beetle that inhabits deep forest. Prized by enthusiasts for its brilliant gold color: specimens fetch a high price.

name: Desert Killer
description: Sea monster in the Great Sandy Sea, claimed many fishermen's lives. Tough scales prized for construction, but its flesh is dry and unappetizing.

name: Flying Egg
description: A mutant species of eggfoot that inhabits the Great Sandy Sea. Cannot be entered in eggfoot races as flying is against the rules.

name: Qualasmi
description: A subspecies of flying egg. Cannot be entered in eggfoot races as flying is against the rules.

name: Sandworm
description: A worm-monster that inhabits deserts and rocky ridges. Tends to gather wherever there is carrion. Attempts to bite if it smells blood.

name: Scavenger
description: A subspecies of sandworm that inhabits deserts and rocky ridges. Tends to gather wherever there is carrion. Attempts to bite if it smells blood.

name: Yellow Slime
description: Barrow-dwelling aether slime subspecies. Dissolves and absorbs anything that crosses its path. Can vibrate its body to boost its resistance to magic.

name: Scarab
description: A subspecies of army beetle that inhabits the desert. Eats sandworms. Antiques are occasionally found snagged on its horns.

name: Sand Lizard
description: A subspecies of lizard that inhabits the Shandar Ridge. Ferociously seizes any chance to bite. Does not take damage while hiding underground.

name: Snow Wolf
description: A subspecies of hellhound that inhabits cold regions. Savages its prey with its razor-sharp claws and fangs.

name: Frost Slime
description: Cold region aether slime subspecies. Dissolves and absorbs anything that crosses its path. Can freeze its body to boost its resistance to magic.

name: Assault Tiger
description: A beast-monster that inhabits the Whitecrowns and preys on other creatures. Relentlessly attacks travelers.

name: Ice Golem
description: A monster that inhabits cold regions. Nobody knows how long it has existed. Aimlessly roams the snowy plains, assailing anything that moves.

name: Snow Boxer
description: A warrior that inhabits the extreme north. Closes in with agile footwork and targets vital points with precise punches. Beware of its right cannon.

name: Azhdahag
description: A dragon in the Chelonian Goliath, Vilashnu. This vicious, malevolent creature has earned the epithet "Raging Slayer" on the continent.

name: Heavy Modified Specimen B_1929
description: A weapon born from Dux Aldric's research. Created by melding an Azhdahag with a rune-lens in an attempt to make a controllable specimen.

name: Flame Gel
description: A subspecies of grimeoid that inhabits deserts. Attacks by spewing flames.

name: Grimeoid
description: A slime monster that inhabits shore areas. Attacks by spewing venom.

name: Salamander
description: A reptilian monster that emits great heat from its skin. Some species feed on ore, which they melt and absorb using their high body temperature.

name: Ripper Raptor
description: A reptilian monster that inhabits grassland. Travels in packs and seizes prey with its sharp claws.

name: Synthetic Specimen R_0901
description: A weapon born from Dux Aldric's research, mass-produced by melding ripper raptors with rune-lenses to yield controllable specimens.

name: Veronite
description: An arthropod monster endemic to deserts and rocky ridges. Well-camouflaged to hide amid the sandy wastes. Resistant to surkkamui venom.

name: Carcasseater
description: A monster that inhabits grassland and tunnels. Seizes prey with its sharp pincers. If this pest proliferates, it devours all surrounding fauna.

name: Maneater
description: A subspecies of carcass eater that inhabits forests. Seizes prey with its sharp pincers. If this pest proliferates, it devours all surrounding fauna.

name: Nidhoggr
description: A rare dragon that inhabits the Chelonian Goliath, Vilashnu. This ancient species has earned the epithet "Champion of the Sun" on the continent.

name: Synthetic Specimen R_0812
description: A weapon born from Dux Aldric's research. Created by melding a nidhoggr with a rune-lens in an attempt to make a controllable specimen.

name: Spy Orb
description: A type of Rune Golem seen in the Runebarrows. Only a weak scout, but will attack intruders inside the barrows.

name: Spy Orb
description: A type of Rune Golem sighted in the Northern Barrows. Only a weak scout, but will attack intruders inside the barrows. Covered in moss.

name: Mine Orb
description: A type of Rune Golem originally seen in the Runebarrows. This dreadful golem attempts to kill intruders by self-destructing in a kamikaze attack.

name: Murdersoul
description: An elemental monster seen in the Rune-Lens Research Laboratory. Exceedingly resistant to all forms of magic except its elemental weakness.

name: Aquasoul
description: An element monster seen in shore areas. Exceedingly resistant to all forms of magic except its elemental weakness.

name: Ice-soul
description: An element monster seen in cold regions. Exceedingly resistant to all forms of magic except its elemental weakness.

name: Xibalba
description: An element monster seen in revenant castles. Exceedingly resistant to all forms of magic except its elemental weakness.

name: Nikkari
description: Shore spirit monster. The Nikkari is a specter animated by the soul of a warrior. Its slashing strike can reputedly cleave a tombstone in two.

name: Lesser Demon
description: A higher species of pawn demon. Demons themselves are very seldom sighted. Origin unknown.

name: Arch-Demon
description: A subspecies of the very rarely sighted lesser demon. Higher species of demons are said to have smaller bodies.

name: Dragon Viper
description: A reptilian monster that inhabits the depths of the Greatwood. Pounces on prey and attempts to swallow it whole.

name: Angry Bat
description: Tunnel small flying monster. Generally has a timid disposition and feeds on insects and small animals, but angrily attacks any humans it sees.

name: Gourmand Bat
description: A subspecies of angry bat that inhabits forests. Enjoys feeding on ripe fruit. May attack humans when startled.

name: Tundra Bat
description:
A subspecies of angry bat that inhabits cold regions.
Has a placid disposition and feeds on frozen prey. May attack humans when startled.

name: Surkkamui
description: A reptilian monster endemic to Shandar Ridge. Preys on the Shandar sand lizard, weakening its target by spitting a potent venom.

name: Bloodleech
description: A worm-like monster that inhabits forests. Whirls as it leaps to latch on its prey and feasts on its blood.

name: Hardknock
description: A type of Rune Golem seen in the Runebarrows. Beats intruders to death with arms.

name: Protoguard
description: An upgraded Hardknock seen in the Rune-Lens Research Laboratory. Beats intruders to death with arms.

name: Samurai-Revenant
description: A revenant that was once a master swordsman from the East Reach. Cleaves enemies in two with its quick-draw technique.

name: Maiden-Revenant
description: Renowned dancer turned revenant, hailing from a mage family with hair manipulation abilities. Able to cast multiple spells simultaneously.

name: Spookybear-Revenant
description: A giant murderous plush toy summoned by a blue teddy bear that was possessed by the soul of a child that died a tragic death.

name: Spookybear-Revenant
description: The true nature of the giant murderous plush toy summoned by a blue teddy bear that was possessed by the soul of a child that died a tragic death.

name: Watercat
description: A giant teddy bear that was once popular in the Old Kingdom. It grew to hate humans and became violent.

name: Firecat
description: A giant teddy bear that was once popular in the Old Kingdom. It grew to hate humans and became violent.

name: Windcat
description: A colorful members of the Multi Cat, harnessing the power of wind. Puts on a cute facade, but a feisty fighter.

name: Earthcat
description: A colorful members of the Multi Cat, harnessing the power of wind. Puts on a cute facade, but a feisty fighter.

name: Darkcat
description: A colorful members of the Multi Cat, harnessing the power of wind. Puts on a cute facade, but a feisty fighter.

name: Lightcat
description: A colorful members of the Multi Cat, harnessing the power of wind. Puts on a cute facade, but a feisty fighter.

name: Greedtoy
description: A colorful members of the Multi Cat, harnessing the power of wind. Puts on a cute facade, but a feisty fighter.

name: Sonic Wolf
description: A monster from another world that is distressed by its inability to find its way home. It has remarkable agility and attacks anything that approaches.

name: Borschy
description: A monster from another world that is distressed by its inability to find its way home. It has remarkable agility and attacks anything that approaches.

name: Goblomancer
description: A monster from another world that is distressed by its inability to find its way home. It has remarkable agility and attacks anything that approaches.

name: Trovegeist
description: A monster from another world that is distressed by its inability to find its way home. It has remarkable agility and attacks anything that approaches.

name: Jellysalis
description: A monster from another world that is distressed by its inability to find its way home. It has remarkable agility and attacks anything that approaches.

name: Orbguard
description: A monster from another world that is distressed by its inability to find its way home. It has remarkable agility and attacks anything that approaches.

name: Lilith
description: A distinguished class within the demon species, proficient in wielding potent dark magic to drain the life from their victims.

name: Strangers
description: A distinguished class within the demon species, proficient in wielding potent dark magic to drain the life from their victims.

name: Letus
description: A distinguished class within the demon species, proficient in wielding potent dark magic to drain the life from their victims.

name: Helldogs
description: A distinguished class within the demon species, proficient in wielding potent dark magic to drain the life from their victims.

name: Crazy Bear
description: A distinguished class within the demon species, proficient in wielding potent dark magic to drain the life from their victims.

name: Kraken
description: A spontaneously mutated monster inadvertently produced in failed experiment by Momo. Contains a powerful raw lens.

name: Dead countess
description: The revenant form of a woman who had a close bond with Markus when he was human. Even under Diradhe's rule, she retains strong feelings for Markus.

name: Prometheus
description: A large Rune Golem that guards Runebarrows. Stores energy in its massive blade to attack. Powered by the Barrows' energy.

name: Golem Pulverizer
description: A large Rune Golem sighted at the Northern Barrows. Capable of delivering devastating blows with its immense arms. Runs on energy from a rune-lens.

name: Oyamatsumi
description: A gigantic monster that inhabits the desert sands. Desert fishermen flee for their lives upon sighting it. Its bones are used as a building material.

name: Nerthus
description: A beast-monster that inhabits Redthroat Ridge. Hides in holes to ambush unsuspecting humans, and carries its plunder back to its lair.

name: Astraea the Judge
description: A mysterious monster that appeared at the Proving Grounds. Controls the Rune Golems that protect the Barrows, and subjects intruders to a final test.

name: Slaosha the Enforcer
description: A type of Rune Golem that protects the Proving Grounds. Controlled by Astraea the Referee, and attacks intruders with its gigantic sword.

name: Elder Dragon
description: A juvenile dragon that appears in the depths of the Greatwood. Unleashes magical attacks from above onto intruders that violate its territory.

name: Fenrir
description: A large three-headed beast-monster that haunts the depths of the Ice Cave. When all its heads are awakened, it exhales a powerful freezing attack.

name: Chimera
description: Born from Dux Aldric's research, this entity was created by fusing various monsters with a rune-lens in an attempt to make a controllable specimen.

name: Pagurian
description: A large aquatic monster that inhabits the drowned city. Carries the ruins of a building on its back for protection as it hunts for prey.

name: Alde Dracare
description: The Dux's crowning achievement, created by melding a rare black dragon with rune-lens to enable control using the power of a Primal Lens.

name: Alde Dracare
description: The evolved form of the Alde Dracare, transformed by the power of the rune-lens when the latter was set free from the control of the Primal Lens.

name: Ancient King
description: A mysterious swordsman who was sealed in a realm beyond and appeared out of nowhere. He seems to have some ties to the East...

name: Kogen
description: The leader of Kogen's band, which Nowa and his party was asked to go and subdue after it raided Altverden.

name: Yuthus
description: The vanguard captain of Kogen's band, which Nowa and his party were asked to go and subdue after it raided Altverden.

name: Zabi
description: The advisor of Kogen's band, which Nowa and his party was asked to go and subdue after it raided Altverden.

name: Hurstwine
description: A covert operative under Dux Aldric's direct command. Frequently opposes Nowa as a recurring adversary.

name: Chapell
description: An imperial aristocrat devoted to fulfilling Dux Aldric's ambitions. Chapell is an officer and is proficient in magic.

name: Narungarde
description: Mysterious woman aiding Dux Aldric. Utilizes rune-lens power for teleportation and summoning. Masked member of the Conclave of the Dawn.

name: Heinrich
description: A young officer who has sworn fealty to Dux Aldric. Suppresses the power of his rune-lens with a regule, but later loses control of it.

name: Imperial Soldier (Sword)
description: A regular Galdean soldier equipped with standard one-handed sword.

name: Imperial Soldier (Spear)
description: A spearman of the Galdean Empire, equipped with a standard spear.

name: Imperial Soldier (Bow)
description: An archer of the Galdean Empire, equipped with a standard bow.

name: Imperial Elite (Sword)
description: A higher-ranking soldier of the Galdean Empire.

name: Thief (Knife)
description: One of the thieves who run rampant all over Allraan.

name: Thief (Bow)
description: One of the thieves who run rampant all over Allraan.

name: Dragonewt Soldier (Spear)
description: A dragonewt soldier of Kenan.

name: Lampad
description: Elemental monster imprisoned in the Imperial Museum basement. Highly resistant to magic, vulnerable only to its elemental weakness.

name: Lampad
description: Elemental monster imprisoned in the Imperial Museum basement. Highly resistant to magic, vulnerable only to its elemental weakness.

name: Constructor
description: Dux Aldric's creation: a weapon resulting from brainwashing intelligent giants using rune-lenses to forge a controllable specimen.

name: Constructor
description: Dux Aldric's creation: a weapon resulting from brainwashing intelligent giants using rune-lenses to forge a controllable specimen.

name: Constructor
description: Dux Aldric's creation: Baron Hassell acquired the specimen after it was discarded due to it going out of control.

name: Golem Pulverizer
description: A distinguished class within the demon species, proficient in wielding potent dark magic to drain the life from their victims.

name: Constructor
description: Revenant of an elite knight, wandering battlefields with their loyal steed. Still protecting the beloved kingdom he served valiantly.

name: Velious Prot
description: A monster from another world that is distressed by its inability to find its way home. It has remarkable agility and attacks anything that approaches.

name: Lampad
description: Elemental monster imprisoned in the Imperial Museum basement. Highly resistant to magic, vulnerable only to its elemental weakness.

name: Crazy Bear
description: A distinguished class within the demon species, proficient in wielding potent dark magic to drain the life from their victims.

name: Cat Bandit
description: A distinguished class within the demon species, proficient in wielding potent dark magic to drain the life from their victims.

name: Lampad
description: Elemental monster imprisoned in the Imperial Museum basement. Highly resistant to magic, vulnerable only to its elemental weakness.

name: Constructor
description: Revenant of an elite knight, wandering battlefields with their loyal steed. Still protecting the beloved kingdom he served valiantly.

name: Gausshastur
description: One of the mask-wearing members of a group called the Conclave of the Dawn. A magic user skilled in earth magic.

name: Androctasiae
description: Stone guardian brought to life by high magic. If its magic wanes, its vibrant blue eyes fade, returning it to a mere statue.

name: Gremlin
description: Stone seal guardian brought to life by high magic . If its magic wanes, its vibrant yellow eyes fade, returning it to a mere statue.

name: Androctasiae
description: Revenant of an elite knight, wandering battlefields with their loyal steed. Still protecting the beloved kingdom he served valiantly.

name: Ammit
description: Stone guardian brought to life by high magic. If its magic wanes, its vibrant blue eyes fade, returning it to a mere statue.

name: Crazy Bear
description: A distinguished class within the demon species, proficient in wielding potent dark magic to drain the life from their victims.

name: Crazy Bear
description: Elemental monster imprisoned in the Imperial Museum basement. Highly resistant to magic, vulnerable only to its elemental weakness.

name: Crazy Bear
description: A giant teddy bear that was once popular in the Old Kingdom. It grew to hate humans and became violent.

name: Bloodfest
description: A mysterious swordsman who was sealed in a realm beyond and appeared out of nowhere. He seems to have some ties to the East...

name: Kerberos
description: A large three-headed beast-monster that was summoned through a magic circle in the basement of Castle Harganthia. It exhales a powerful flame breath.
